lender.name: Edward

lender.occupational_info: I am Boyani Onuonga, aged 34 and single mother of one (Noel arekwa kelonye). Am educated to certificate level. I have a small mitumba business which i request to be loaned so as to add my stock and at least have a permanent premise to do my business and also be able to support my child in schooling. I also wish to combine my business with a small saloon and acomputer. I look forward to anyone who can assist willingly. Thanks in advance and God bless you all as you plan to help me and others in need.

lender.name: Allyson
lender.loan_because: I want to do my part as a global citizen to alleviate poverty in the most affective, positive and sustainable way.

lender.name: Jennifer
lender.loan_because: I have been blessed and I want to be a blessing to others. "Open your hands and you will be blessed". Jesus Loves You.

lender.name: Francisco
lender.loan_because: I feel we need to help people fighting to have a better way of living
lender.occupational_info: I provide consultancy BPM & BI services to local businesses and state goverment

lender.name: Jeff
lender.loan_because: I have been given so many chances in my life, and I truly beleive that we can change our world by caring for each other, one person at a time.
lender.occupational_info: I research subjects in history to verify their facts, and to make sure that history is preserved with honesty and integrity..

lender.name: Cyrus & Brooke
lender.loan_because: We feel incredibly fortunate to have been born in a developed country and to have had the opportunities we've had. We lend to help others in need to hopefully make a difference in their lives. We, and many other's in our country, believe there needs to be better wealth distribution and aid from developed nations to others around the world.
lender.occupational_info: I work as a captain on vessels that are platforms for scientific research and my wife works as a videographer to help promote environmental awareness and to educate the public of the imbalances our planet now faces, of which we all must be responsible for.

lender.name: Nilesh Dosooye
lender.loan_because: I care

lender.name: Adam
lender.loan_because: it is my chance to give back to the world. Social injustices and destitution plague our world each and every day. Through Kiva we are enabled to help overcome these plagues.
lender.occupational_info:
I am a Canisius High School graduate heading into Canisius College for the fall. I will begin my studies in International Business and Spanish, thus providing credentials to leave the country someday to fight social injustices and economic instability. I have plans to go to Mexico my Freshman year and am very excited.
Over the Spring I attended a life changing Immersion trip to the Republica Dominicana. I was able to attended this trip through the efforts of Canisius High.
On this trip we rebuilt a house for a man by the name of Fulvio. Earlier in the year his house had burned due to a propane explosion. Fulvio had a large family to feed and protect. Help was in dire need. Nine of my classmates and three teachers attended the trip to help rebuild what he had lost. It was a success. Along with the rebuilding of the house we also helped build the roof of a community center in a Haitian refugee camp named Acension
After we had finished, never in my life did I feel more content and proud of myself. The feeling was exhilarating and life changing......... forever. I hope to get that same kind of feeling through Kiva.

lender.name: Larissa
lender.loan_because: I can't afford to donate large amounts of money every month but I've always wanted to help out somehow. When a professor told me about Kiva, I knew this was something I could do to help someone else.
lender.occupational_info: I work at a B2B franchisor doing public relations for our franchisees and corporate communications. Basically, whenever someone in the company needs something professionally written, they come to me.

lender.name: Rotary Club of Union
lender.loan_because: This is the international project of the Rotary Club of Union, NJ. Our members are interested in what is taking place in the community, nation, and the world, and are motivated to make a difference in the lives of others.
lender.occupational_info: Rotary members have many opportunities for humanitarian service, both locally and internationally. Through Rotary, you can help make the world a better place. Service programs address concerns that include poverty, illiteracy, health care, hunger, community needs and more. Rotarians experience the fulfillment that comes from giving back to the community. Rotarians are welcomed at more than 31,200 Rotary clubs in over 160 countries, wearing a pin that is recognized throughout the world. Rotarians gain an understanding of humanitarian issues through international service projects and exchange programs. One of Rotary’s highest objectives is to build goodwill and peace throughout the world.

lender.name: Natasha
lender.loan_because: I am an entrepreneur myself and I always seem to need a little more money to make it work.
lender.occupational_info: I own a kid's fitness franchise and work as a marketing coordinator for a local family services non-profit.

lender.occupational_info: I work with individuals and small business entities to help facilitate compliance with complex tax laws and regulations. This includes return preparation, financial analysis and tax research and consultation.

lender.loan_because: U.S. is an imperialist state and trying to act in solidarity with those who have lived with the repercussions of colonialism and imperialism is a mere start to creating a better world that I am fighting for

lender.name: Ved, Vivek, Vandana
lender.loan_because: helping someone become independent and enabling them to get access to better opportunities is our small way of reaching out to others

lender.occupational_info: I work in reading and literacy. Education is important it empowers people to transform their lives.

lender.occupational_info: Fulfilling! My kids are my life and I'm a hard working wife.

lender.occupational_info: I translate technical and general texts from German into English. My operating instructions are easy to understand! :)

lender.loan_because: Kiva offers me a chance to put my money to good use by letting it benefit other instead of wasting it on things I don't need.
lender.occupational_info: I am a university student studying Journalism. I will later study library science in graduate school.

lender.name: Jenn
lender.loan_because: I think this is a worthwhile project. I've had the opportunity to travel and I know how a little bit of help can really be important to many people in the world. We can all help one another. For less than the price of a tank of gas, you can lend a helping hand!
lender.occupational_info: I take care of my two children full time and I am a photographer part time.

lender.occupational_info: I work with families to help them succeed; and I work with troubled children so they can return to their families one day.

lender.name: mike and belinda
lender.loan_because: a few years ago Mikes parents lent us some money so we could start our own business which has been highly succesful. We want to help other people who want to have a crack at running their own show.
lender.occupational_info: Really simple! Selling stuff (clothing and travel gear) in a shop. It ain't glamorous but it's fun and profitable.

lender.name: Esther
lender.loan_because: I've been blessed with people who have supported me, now I want to give something back.

lender.name: Dan
lender.loan_because: helping other people changing their lives is priceless.
lender.occupational_info: i help social enterprises plan and scale their reach.

lender.name: Beth
lender.loan_because: It's good to be able to help!
lender.occupational_info: I teach classes in literature.

lender.loan_because: It's a simple gesture with a great impact.

lender.loan_because: I am fortunate and I want to help.

lender.occupational_info: I practice a filed of medicine called urology in a semi-rural community in the state if Tennessee in the USA. I take care of patients in the clinic and do surgery on those needing it.

lender.name: Andrew
lender.loan_because: I'm not rich but I feel I'm blessed with more than enough and I'd like to help those who need it.

lender.name: Terry & Judy
lender.loan_because: To whom much is given, much is required

lender.name: Michelle
lender.loan_because: My daughter gave me a certificate for my birthday.

lender.name: Patrick
lender.loan_because: it feels good to give even this small something back to the world and in some way help others.
lender.occupational_info: I am a computer programmer, working at a book distribution warehouse.

lender.name: Salvador
lender.loan_because:
My family and I immigrated to the US from Central America 27 years ago. I remember my mother telling me stories about a small store that she used to have in her home when we were young. The money she made from selling items out of her home, made it possible for her to put food on the table for her family.
I lend because I am greatful for my mothers sacrifice. I am giving back to those that are making the sacrifice to lift their families up and out of poverty.
lender.occupational_info: I work with low income teenagers, that need guidence in their lives. I am also going to school to become a teacher.

lender.name: João
lender.loan_because: I believe in simple people

lender.name: Aimee
lender.loan_because: I can! I have vast opportunities as a woman in a free country. My international sisters aren't as lucky as I am. I feel so proud to be able to make a positive difference in the lives of others. My heart is full.

lender.name: Diane
lender.loan_because: I am truly blessed and want to help my brothers & sisters in humanity.

lender.name: Marion
lender.occupation: Clown in a hospital for children

lender.name: Martin
lender.loan_because: I have travelled the world extensively ,both as a soldier and civilian. We are so lucky to have been born in such a prosperous part of the world and should try and balance the disparity with those who are not so lucky.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a Battlefield Guide and take schoolchildren to places where the British Army have fought. I explain to them the truth about war.

lender.name: Emily
lender.loan_because: it works.

lender.name: Laura
lender.loan_because: I am able to
lender.occupational_info: I take care of people at the end of their lives who have AIDS

lender.name: Paul
lender.loan_because: Life's given me a lot more than I need, so I'm spreading it around.
lender.occupational_info: For now, I work at a big, fancy law firm. It's not as exciting as you'd think. Or maybe you think it's not exciting, in which case you'd be correct.

lender.name: Rick Redline
lender.loan_because: I believe that microfinance is the worlds best hope of alleviating poverty in this generation.
lender.occupational_info: I teach English to children 6-12 years old. This work lets me travel the world and understand it's people.

lender.name: Xinwei
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference to this earth that i live in.
lender.occupational_info: I work to help others and make this place a better place

lender.name: Anne
lender.loan_because: Every person has the power to make the world a better place.

lender.name: Salome
lender.loan_because: there's never a wrong time to do the right thing. And these people work hard and appreciate any help they get.

lender.name: Adam and Becca
lender.loan_because: ...well, because we can. It is our small way to help create a better world, and this world needs a lot of help!
lender.occupational_info: Adam teaches cultural anthropology at Augustana College. Becca is a musician and works in a research clinic.

lender.name: Laura B.
lender.loan_because: I admire initiative and the courage it takes to ask for help. I feel wonderful being able to help. It empowers me. It radiates a great sense of possibility.
lender.occupational_info: I make portrait paintings with oils. I love making art.

lender.name: Braxton
lender.loan_because: I loaned because my Granddad gave me a certificate
lender.occupational_info: I'm a student at Maple Ridge

lender.name: Christine
lender.loan_because: We all need to help others help themselves.

lender.name: Keith
lender.loan_because: I can

lender.name: Aaron
lender.loan_because: I like the idea of helping the fisherman buy the rod.
lender.occupational_info: I run educational leadership training programs for high school students.

lender.name: Anna
lender.loan_because: I know what it is like to be without; without money, without resources, without hope. I believe that helping those that are striving to help themselves is the best investment we can make in our collective future.

lender.name: Carey
lender.loan_because: It is a really nice thing to do.

lender.name: Shiko
lender.loan_because: We are a non-profit community drumming group based in Swansea, UK. We play songs and rhythms inspired by the music of Africa. The group unanimously decided to use a proportion of group funds to lend to people in developing countries, and in particular Africa, in gratitude for the gift of music that has been passed on to us.

lender.name: Nathan
lender.loan_because: It's difficult to get a small business started, and while I don't have the capital to be a financier in the US; with Kiva I can still make a difference to help other entrepreneurs improve their local economies the world over.
lender.occupational_info: I own a small company that helps other businesses build, use, and otherwise take advantage of new and emerging technologies to improve their products and services as well as their outreach to customers.

lender.name: Trevor Powell
lender.loan_because: God has been good to me and made it possible for me to share with others.
lender.occupational_info: I work at Yahoo! and help build the Internet.

lender.name: Liblav
lender.occupational_info: I help people find information. I teach computer classes, and run programs at the library for people to enjoy and learn.

lender.name: Wayne
lender.loan_because: give to those who ask
lender.occupational_info: My work is with my son ,we install flooring. I also have 13 grandchildren and enjoy every minute with them.

lender.name: Gregory
lender.loan_because: I am little more then a placeholder in this world just trying to do the little that I can, Max and Sam will fix things.
lender.occupational_info: I work with school kids that have learning and emotional needs.

lender.name: Kay
lender.loan_because: It is an effective way to made a difference
lender.occupational_info: I manage an office and do the accounting

lender.name: Gary
lender.loan_because: it's the right thing to do!
lender.occupational_info: Accountant for an International Oil & Gas Company

lender.name: Jared
lender.loan_because: Everyone needs a hand from time to time.
lender.occupational_info: I look at tissue taken out of a person by a surgeon. I then tell the surgeon what the disease is (cancer or otherwise).

lender.name: Robin
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: I work with companies to determine and develop the best ways to train people on how to do their jobs well.

lender.name: James
lender.loan_because: I believe that small business loans to women are one of the best ways I can contribute to change in Africa.

lender.name: Carolyn
lender.loan_because: It helps those who wish to help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: Empowering those to make a difference in their own life.

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: An individual who has the means to make a difference to someone's life has a moral obligation to do so.

lender.name: Gaby
lender.loan_because: I want to help make a difference in the world.

lender.name: Emily
lender.loan_because: I have very few resources otherwise with which to help the people both around me and outside of my country - Kiva allows me to extend a helpful nudge where it's needed regardless of my circumstances, so I can always be sure that there is a way I can contribute.
lender.occupational_info: As far as my job, you mean? I shave the hair off of wealthy people's dogs in fancy ways. Inglorious to be sure, but it's fun in a way and it gets me along. You meet the most interesting people in a grooming shop...

lender.name: Diane
lender.loan_because: I am blessed

lender.name: Greg
lender.loan_because: If you want to attain happiness, make others happy.

lender.name: Susan
lender.occupational_info: Educating students about the importance of Water.

lender.name: Katy
lender.occupational_info: community services worker

lender.name: autumn
lender.loan_because: we are called to reach out to the least of these...
lender.occupational_info: just lovin' Jesus

lender.name: Carina
lender.loan_because: I like the entrepreneurial spirit in the people requesting loans.
lender.occupational_info: I own four businesses with my husband and father - automotive center, childcare center, donut shop and information technology consulting. We also own some residential and commercial real estate.

lender.name: Beth
lender.loan_because: I can
lender.occupational_info: journalist, dog lover, brown belt

lender.name: Matthew
lender.loan_because: Despite being as poor as I am, I want to find a way to help others. I think this is a great way to assist people and it allows lenders to be in control of where their money goes unlike cryptically donating to a non-profit organization and not have any idea where your money actually ends up. I have massive college loans and barely make enough to survive myself, but at 26, I can fully understand a lot of people have a much tougher life than my own and I am happy I can help people work towards improving their lives.
lender.occupational_info: I am a first generation college graduate with a degree in linguistics and I play/write music in my free time. Currently, I am completing my Master's at the University of Massachusetts, Boston in applied linguistics. If you would like to check out my band, click on the link below:

lender.name: George
lender.loan_because: I have travel extensively in central and south america, have gotten to know the people, and I have seen the struggle that they have in trying to make a good life. In a small way, I hope to help those who are helping themselves.

lender.name: Maia
lender.loan_because: It's important to help others.
lender.occupational_info: I am in 5th grade & I love music.

lender.name: Jimmy and Judi
lender.loan_because: We hope that our small part can help someone improve or change their lives.

lender.name: Linda " Lulu "
lender.loan_because: Because I want to......

lender.name: Cheryl
lender.loan_because: I am grateful to have a pretty comfortable life, and if I can use just a little of what I have to assist someone else with capital that can help them achieve their goals I am glad to do so. I very much believe that a microloans program can change the world and eliminate poverty.
lender.occupational_info: I am a teacher of English in a high school for students 14-18 years old.

lender.name: Lenora
lender.loan_because: It is the right thing to do. It is within all of us to empower others to fulfill their dreams and live a life with hope.
lender.occupational_info: I work for the government, to negotiate funding for agencies to deliver services to adults with developmental disabilities

lender.name: Kriszta
lender.occupational_info: Call center manager: with big ears. I know everything about nothing. Try to do the best: to overcome the material world.

lender.name: Tricia
lender.loan_because: It's the only way I know to help people who are not as fortunate as me

lender.name: Sabina
lender.loan_because: I believe helping someone realize their potential may be the best way to not only help, but respect them.

lender.name: Ulrike
lender.loan_because: It's a great way to help!

lender.name: Janice
lender.loan_because: The world would be a much better place if we all just helped each other out. Not everyone is as fortunate as many of us are. It's a tough world out there for many people and if a simple donation can help improve their lives just a little, I think it's worth giving.

lender.name: Erica
lender.loan_because: I see the need to give others a fair go
lender.occupational_info: Prepare children for the future. Give children the oppotunity to have a choice.

lender.name: William
lender.loan_because: Every once in a while i remember the many times i have lived on the mercy and kindness of strangers. They all wished me well, by word and deed. I hope to extend the same hand to others so that they too can fulfill their dreams. And the kindness of strangers spreads further into the world and for all times.

lender.name: Juliarna
lender.loan_because: I can and I care
lender.occupational_info: I make jewellery that captures the very essence of your loved one as a special keepsake to treasure and cherish

lender.name: Stefano
lender.loan_because: I want to help the people
lender.occupational_info: I'm writing software

lender.name: Ingo (i.k) und Reinhild
lender.loan_because: I want to help
lender.occupational_info: I sell Printer for Industrie, ex. to print the Exp. Date on Food.

lender.name: Linda
lender.loan_because: a loan makes 'people' own their dream, instead of waiting for/ relying on charity!
lender.occupational_info: I work as a clinical nurse specialist for childeren and families who are hiv positive.

lender.name: Caroline
lender.loan_because: I want to help people.
lender.occupational_info: I take care of my family and practice dharma.

lender.name: Natasha
lender.loan_because: I believe in teaching someone to fish, no matter where they are or where I am
lender.occupational_info: I help people in my province, both homeowners and business owners, become more energy efficient and use less electricity. Lower electrical bills means less greenhouse gas and more money in your pocket to do something else, maybe lend on Kiva!

lender.name: MCMARROW ENTERPRISES
lender.loan_because: Sharing is the way for all mankind to survive the 21st century.
lender.occupational_info: Promotes CD sales for concert artist Marie McMarrow who has been performing for over 25years.We just learned about Kiva and wish to use part proceeds of the sale of sound tracks to benefit other entrepreneurs around the world.

lender.name: Iwan
lender.loan_because: To make change happen.

lender.name: Kurt
lender.loan_because: I teach an amazing group of caring young people who want to diminish poverty by helping people help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I teach high school economics.

lender.name: Tyler
lender.loan_because: I used to be in peace corps and my best friend in burkina could use something like this
lender.occupational_info: I work for a large Northeastern Electric Company dealing with regulation issues.

lender.name: Thorben
lender.loan_because: I'm dedicated. Everybody should help to make this world a little better. I don't think that kiva.org is the best way to do so, but it's a sign. A sign towards people which have the hope to build up their own future. Use your hope since it gives you strength!
lender.occupational_info: I help multiple disabled people living their own live like everyone else does.

lender.name: Andrea
lender.loan_because: it's exciting to watch people's dreams grow
lender.occupational_info: making art, creating and facilitating creativity workshops, helping others find their creativity

lender.name: pablolic
lender.loan_because: I want to help others to live better, to be able to have dreams, and work hard to make their dreams become a reality. I also want to support Kiva in its mission.

lender.name: Jeff
lender.loan_because: we are interdependent.
lender.occupational_info: I teach medical imaging (x-rays, CAT scan, etc) to students in Virginia, USA

lender.name: Susan
lender.loan_because: I like to help people in financial difficulty.
lender.occupational_info: I am a minister working in a Christian church.

lender.name: Andrea
lender.loan_because: share luck

lender.name: Tony & Elizabeth
lender.loan_because: It makes sense.

lender.name: Martyn
lender.loan_because: Everyone deserves a chance!

lender.name: Stefan
lender.loan_because: I know how much $25 can mean in some places around the world.
lender.occupational_info: I am a creative person with over ten years experience in designing interactive interfaces that meet user needs.
